meta_description: The Contemporary Arts Center impacts regional and global communities by providing changing arts experiences that challenge, entertain and educate.
admission_text:
## Gallery Hours

  * Monday - Wednesday: Building is closed
  * Thursday - Friday: 10am - 7pm
  * Saturday - Sunday: 10am - 4pm******  
**

### General Admission: $12

### Kids 18 and under: Free

### Members: Free

### SNAP/EBT Recipients: Free

[CAC MEMBERSHIP OPTIONS](http://web.archive.org/web/20251105040949/https://www.contemporaryartscenter.org/support/become-a-member)[](http://web.archive.org/web/20251105040949/https://www.contemporaryartscenter.org/support/become-a-member)

## 

## CAC Holiday Hours

  * New Year's Day: Closed
  * Martin Luther King, Jr Day: Closed
  * President's Day: Closed
  * Memorial Day: Closed
  * Juneteenth: Closed
  * Independence Day: Closed
  * Thanksgiving Day: Closed
  * Christmas Eve: Closed
  * Christmas Day: Closed
  * New Year's Eve: Closed

You can also experience the CAC through our social media pages, digital content, and experiences on our website

**[MAKE A GIFT TODAY](http://web.archive.org/web/20251105040949/https://www.contemporaryartscenter.org/support/donate)**

* * *

## Policies

Visitors 12 and Under MUST be accompanied by an adult 18 or older. Teens (13–17) Without a parent or legal guardian present must complete the free Teen Membership form for admission. Teen Membership forms are available at the CAC’s front desk.

Just present your student ID or driver’s permit/license to receive an application. Use your membership pass for unlimited admission to CAC galleries and teen programming.

* * *

### Bag Policy

accessibility_text:
Here at the CAC, we believe that art and the creative process belong to all people. The CAC offers a variety of services and accommodations to ensure visitors of all abilities have meaningful access to the exhibitions and programs.

The CAC is committed to facilitating the usability of this website for people with disabilities. We are currently in consultation to achieve full accessibility for our website. We appreciate your understanding as we work toward this goal. If you have feedback or questions about this effort, or any of our accessibility services, please contact [Kelsey Robinson](http://web.archive.org/web/20260109052454/mailto:krobinson@cincycac.org).

### Parking

Accessible parking is available at the 21C valet, which is located on Walnut, right around the corner from the CAC's 6th Street entrance. Please notify the valet and 21C front desk staff that you are there for CAC accessible parking to receive the $10 rate.

### Entry and General Navigation

The CAC's entrance is located at street level, in the middle of the building on 6th Street. The entrance has an automatic door. You will enter the glass doors and turn right, moving through another set of glass doors. Please proceed to the front desk to check-in.

Accessible restrooms are located on all floors except the lobby. All floors are accessible via elevators. There are two elevators available to visitors. A large elevator is located to the left of the visitor services desk and offers access to all gallery flo...
